txt.en:
'When the Gauredain stormed into our camp, they stole our supplies: our packed fish, tinder, grease, many things that we must now shiver here without.

'We have dispatched our own parties to find these packages, but any help you could provide would be greatly appreciated.

'The Gauredain are cruel and care little for the actual provisions. Most likely they simply scattered them about. Please search south of here and see if you can reclaim some of them.'
'Oh, how those packed fish call to me!  All of these good things you have brought back for us, we are honoured to have had your help.'
'We must have our provisions if we are to remain at this post.'
The Gauredain repeatedly raid Lossoth hunting outposts, both to antagonize the Lossoth and to take their provisions.
Search south of Karhu-leiri for the scattered provisions of the Lossoth.
